question:
You would like to work overseas, write a letter to an employment agency.
write
what job you would like to apply 
what companies are you  looking for 
why do you want to work overseas
text: I am writing with reference to your advertisement in the local ‘employment news’ magazine for want of various categories of workers in New Zealand. I consider that my credentials match the category of certified nursing assistant and I want to apply for the same. I am enclosing my CV for this job.

Presently, I am deputed as a nurse at a regional hospital. I was working here for the last two years . During these years I have equipped myself with all the nursing functions, which include taking and recording temperature, blood pressure, pulse and respiratory rates along with cleaning, sterilizing, and preparing treatment trays. Strong communication skills and reacting actively to emergency situations have made me an organised nursing assistant.

Although I am enjoying my present job, I am looking for new opportunities in the develop world. I am sure that working in New Zealand would broaden my horizons even further, and on coming back, I would be able to serve my people even further.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me at 9885614236. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

error_list.error_des: The noun phrase certified nursing assistant seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
The word develop doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
